Interface VirtualView

All Known Subinterfaces:
VirtualViewRMI, VirtualViewSocket
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIClient, SocketClient, SocketClientHandler
public interface VirtualView

  • Method Details

    • error

      void error() throws Exception
      Handles an error scenario within the system, triggering any necessary error-related processes or communications.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the handling process

    • changeID

      void changeID(UUID id) throws Exception
      Updates the unique identifier (UUID) for the current view.
      Parameters:
      id - the new UUID to associate with the view
      Throws:
      Exception - if the update process fails

    • updateGameCreated

      void updateGameCreated(int level, List<Deck> showableDecks, ArrayList<Player> players, int hourglass, int surrender) throws Exception
      Updates the game creation state with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      level - The level of the game being created.
      showableDecks - A list of decks that can be shown during the game setup.
      players - A list of players participating in the game.
      hourglass - The number of hourglass timers available.
      surrender - The maximum allowable number of surrenders before resolution.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the update of the game creation state.

    • depositThingInHand

      void depositThingInHand(String playerNickname) throws Exception
      Handles the action of depositing a specific item or object currently in the possession of the specified player into the appropriate location or storage.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - The unique identifier or name of the player who is performing the deposit action.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the deposit action cannot be completed due to invalid input, player state, or other unexpected issues.

    • pickTileLMR

      void pickTileLMR(int tileIndex, String playerNickname) throws Exception
      Allows a player to pick a specific tile by specifying its index. The operation is performed by the player identified by their nickname.
      Parameters:
      tileIndex - the index of the tile to be picked
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player who is picking the tile
      Throws:
      Exception - if the operation cannot be completed

    • insertTileLMR

      void insertTileLMR(int tileIndex, int row, int col, int rotation, String playerNickname) throws Exception
      Inserts a tile into a specific position within the game board with a defined rotation, while associating the action with a specific player.
      Parameters:
      tileIndex - the index of the tile to be inserted
      row - the row position where the tile will be placed
      col - the column position where the tile will be placed
      rotation - the rotation to be applied to the tile during placement
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player performing this action
      Throws:
      Exception - if the tile cannot be inserted due to game rules or other constraints

    • pickLittleDeckLMR

      void pickLittleDeckLMR(int deckIndex, String playerNickname) throws Exception
      Allows a player to pick a small deck by specifying its index. This action is associated with a specific player identified by their nickname.
      Parameters:
      deckIndex - the index of the small deck to be picked
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player performing the action
      Throws:
      Exception - if the action cannot be completed due to game-specific issues

    • addAlienOrHumansLMR

      void addAlienOrHumansLMR(String playerNickname, boolean wantAlien, AlienColor alienColor, int row, int column) throws Exception
      Adds an alien or human to the specified position in the game for the given player.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player performing the action
      wantAlien - a boolean indicating whether the entity to add is an alien (true) or a human (false)
      alienColor - the color of the alien to add, if wantAlien is true
      row - the row position where the entity will be added
      column - the column position where the entity will be added
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an issue adding the entity or the inputs are invalid

    • setPlayerPosInFlightBoard

      void setPlayerPosInFlightBoard(String playerNickname, int pos) throws Exception
      Sets the position of a player on the flight board.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player whose position is to be set
      pos - the new position of the player on the flight board
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while setting the player's position

    • endbuilding

      void endbuilding(String playerNickname, int positionWhereToGo) throws Exception
      Ends the building phase for the specified player and moves them to the given position on the game board or related structure.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player whose building phase is being ended
      positionWhereToGo - the position on the game board or structure where the player is to be moved
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while ending the building phase or updating the player's position

    • endBuildingPhaseForAll

      void endBuildingPhaseForAll() throws Exception
      Ends the building phase for all active players in the game. This method is responsible for transitioning the game state from the building phase to the subsequent phase, ensuring that all required actions related to the building phase are finalized.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the operation.

    • sendPenalty

      void sendPenalty(int penalty, String type) throws Exception
      Sends a penalty notification or applies a specific penalty based on the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      penalty - the value of the penalty to be applied; should typically represent the magnitude or severity.
      type - the type or category of the penalty to define its nature or context.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an issue while sending or processing the penalty.

    • abandonedShipTakenActivate

      void abandonedShipTakenActivate(Player player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> posPers) throws Exception
      Activates the "abandoned ship taken" event for the specified player and processes the related positions of personnel or other elements.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom the "abandoned ship taken" event is activated.
      posPers - A list of positions represented as a 2D array of integers, where each inner list indicates specific personnel positions or game-related data.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the activation process.

    • updateCardUse

      void updateCardUse(Card card) throws Exception
      Updates the state of the specified card to reflect its current usage in the game. This method performs any necessary updates to the card and ensures the game state is consistent with the card's effects or usage.
      Parameters:
      card - the card whose state is to be updated. Must not be null and must be a valid card instance in the current game context.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the update process encounters an error or if the provided card is invalid.

    • updateCardUseSTATE

      void updateCardUseSTATE(c_State Stato) throws Exception
      Updates the state of a card in the game with the specified c_State object.
      Parameters:
      Stato - the state object representing the updated state of the card
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the update process

    • updateStatus

      void updateStatus(stateEnum status) throws Exception
      Updates the current state of the game.
      Parameters:
      status - the new state to be set, represented as a value from the stateEnum enumeration
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while updating the state

    • updateFinalScores

      void updateFinalScores(HashMap<String,Float> finalScores) throws Exception
      Updates the final scores for players in the game.
      Parameters:
      finalScores - a HashMap where the keys are player nicknames (as Strings) and the values are their respective final scores (as Floats).
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while updating the scores.

    • chooseAbandonedStationActivate

      void chooseAbandonedStationActivate(Player player, FlightBoard flightBoard, boolean accept, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> storageTiles, ArrayList<ArrayList<Goods>> newGoods) throws Exception
      Activates the process of handling an abandoned station for the specified player. The method determines the outcome based on the player's decision to accept or reject the activation, updates the flight board, and manages the storage tiles and goods affected.
      Parameters:
      player - The player involved in the abandoned station activation.
      flightBoard - The flight board representing the current state of the game.
      accept - A boolean indicating whether the player accepted (true) or rejected (false) the activation of the abandoned station.
      storageTiles - A nested list of integers representing the positions of the storage tiles linked to the abandoned station.
      newGoods - A nested list of goods objects representing the goods associated with the abandoned station.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an issue processing the activation.

    • updateAssertBatteriesPos

      void updateAssertBatteriesPos(Player player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> positions) throws Exception
      Updates the positions of the active batteries for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose batteries' positions are being updated
      positions - a nested list of integers representing the positions of the batteries
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while updating the battery positions

    • updateAddGoods

      void updateAddGoods(Player player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> posGoods, ArrayList<ArrayList<Goods>> goodsSets) throws Exception
      Updates the player's spaceship to add specified goods at specified positions.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose goods need to be updated.
      posGoods - A list of lists containing coordinates where the goods should be placed on the spaceship.
      goodsSets - A list of lists containing the goods sets to be added at the specified positions.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the update process.

    • updateChoosePassengersToLose

      void updateChoosePassengersToLose(Player player, Consequences consequences, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> passengers) throws Exception
      Updates the state of the game by processing the choice of which passengers to lose based on the given player, consequences, and passenger data.
      Parameters:
      player - the player making the decision about which passengers to lose.
      consequences - the consequences associated with losing passengers.
      passengers - a 2D list representing the positions of passengers affected.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during processing.

    • planetFinStatActivate

      void planetFinStatActivate(ArrayList<Player> players, FlightBoard flightBoard) throws Exception
      Activates the planetary final statistics phase with the provided players and flight board.
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players participating in the phase
      flightBoard - the flight board associated with the current game process
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the activation of the phase

    • updateConsequenceLostDays

      void updateConsequenceLostDays(Player player, FlightBoard flightBoard, int numDays, Boolean lostAll) throws Exception
      Updates the information related to the number of lost days due to a consequence in the game. This might involve processing game mechanics regarding penalties or consequences based on the player's and flight board's state.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who is affected by the consequence.
      flightBoard - The flight board on which the player's actions or penalties are applied.
      numDays - The number of days lost as a result of the consequence.
      lostAll - Indicates whether the player has lost all days (true for all days, false otherwise).
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the update process.

    • updateLooseAllGoods

      void updateLooseAllGoods(Player player, Boolean finished, Boolean batteriesLost, Boolean allBatteriesLost) throws Exception
      Updates the status of a player when they lose all goods in a particular scenario.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose goods are being updated
      finished - indicates whether the process or scenario has concluded
      batteriesLost - specifies if batteries were lost during the process
      allBatteriesLost - specifies if all the batteries were lost
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the update

    • updateSmugglersCalc

      void updateSmugglersCalc(Player player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> cannonPos, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> batteryPos) throws Exception
      Updates the calculation of smugglers' effects on the game.
      Parameters:
      player - the player for whom the smugglers' calculation is being updated
      cannonPos - a list of positions representing the cannon slots to consider
      batteryPos - a list of positions representing the battery slots to consider
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the update process

    • updateLostBatteriesSmug

      void updateLostBatteriesSmug(Player player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> batteryData, int numBatteries) throws Exception
      Updates the state of lost batteries for smuggling scenarios. This method is used to handle the logic related to the loss of batteries during smuggling activities.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose batteries are being updated
      batteryData - a 2D list containing the details about the batteries, including their positions
      numBatteries - the total number of batteries that have been lost
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while processing the update
